posts.name: Jessica Smith
posts.cooked:
Welcome to the Weekly Roundup!

04/26/21 - 05/02/21
Issue - V50

Every week we’ll share community-driven apps and articles that were shared with us during the previous week as well as any major announcements from Streamlit. If there is anything we missed feel free to add it in a comment or @ us on Twitter!

  • = articles
  • = videos
  • = apps

Streamlit Updates

  • If you haven’t signed up for Streamlit sharing yet - join here.
  • Check out the Streamlit sharing badge for your GitHub repos:
  • In case you missed it - Secrets Management is now available in sharing! Upgrade and read the docs to get started.
  • Want to see if a career in tech is right for you? Join a free webinar May 11th with special guest @Amanda_Kelly.
  • Version 0.81.0 was released bringing updates to theming and introducing st.form, st.form_submit_button and st.caption Read more about forms and try out the new features in this sample app.

Featured Content

  • Star Trek Script Analysis Dashboard @gmorinan
  • NFL Mock Draft Database @aaroncolesmith
  • Building Web Applications From Python Scripts with Streamlit

Tutorials/Introduction

  • Implémenter une application de Machine Learning sur Streamlit @Mirakl @ahmedbesbes
  • Plotly Tutorial 2021 in Streamlit | Learn Plotly Introduction to Plotly Data Visualization | Python

  • MLOps - GitHub Kubernetes Continuous Model Deployment - Streamlit - Part 2
  • Streamlit Tutorial For Beginners - #part1​ Visualization, SideBar, CheckBox, SelectBox
  • Streamlit Tutorial For beginners - #Part2​ Slider, ProgressBar, Beta Columns, Beta Expander
  • Bank Loan Prediction using Machine Learning || Streamlit App || Python Project
  • How to build your own Streamlit Python web app on Heroku!
  • Building an Application with Survey Data on Streamlit
  • BERT Serverless Deployment with Streamlit (and It’s Free!)
  • Using Streamlit to build an interactive dashboard for data analysis on AWS
  • Data Apps with Python’s Streamlit

posts.name: Ahmed Besbes
posts.cooked:
Hello @Jessica_Smith

Great roundup!

Have you had a look at my tutorial on building a document anonymizer with Streamlit and Spacy and the st-annotated-text component?

Have a good day!
Ahmed
